<!-- Generated by .github/agents/ pipeline — do not hand-edit except Overrides section -->

## Purpose
HTML templates rendered by `FrontendSite.http_response()`. Uses Django template engine with `django_bootstrap5` for Bootstrap 5 styling. Templates follow a base → page → partial hierarchy.

## Template Hierarchy
```
frontend/base.html          ← base layout (navbar, sidebar, CSS, Bootstrap)
  → frontend/home.html      ← home/app landing page (renders _cards.html)
  → frontend/site.html      ← model list/detail page (renders all partials)
accounts/form.html           ← login/signup/password forms (extends base.html)
```

## Layout
`base.html` uses a responsive Bootstrap grid: left sidebar (col-md-3 / col-lg-2) for navigation + right content column (col-md-9 / col-lg-10) for `{% block content %}`. On mobile (< md), sidebar stacks above content.

## Template Blocks
| Block | Defined In | Purpose | Default Content |
|---|---|---|---|
| `title` | `base.html` | `<title>` tag | `{{ meta.brand }}` |
| `content` | `base.html` | Main page body inside `<main>` | Empty |

## Custom Tags & Filters
Loaded via `{% load django_fast_frontend %}`:
| Filter | Signature | Returns | Used In |
|---|---|---|---|
| `split` | `value\|split:"delimiter"` | `list[str]` | `site.html`, `_table.html`, `_toolbar.html`, `_form.html`, `_cards.html` |
| `label` | `value\|label` | str (underscores → spaces, title case) | Same 5 templates |

## Partials (included by site.html)
| Partial | Purpose | Controlled By |
|---|---|---|
| `_toolbar.html` | Action buttons above table | `ModelFrontend.toolbar_button` |
| `_search.html` | Search input | `ModelFrontend.search_fields` |
| `_filter_sort.html` | Filter/sort dropdowns | `ModelFrontend.list_filter`, `sortable_by` |
| `_table.html` | Data table with rows | `ModelFrontend.list_display`, `fields` |
| `_cards.html` | Card-style layout | `ModelFrontend.cards = True` |
| `_form.html` | Add/edit modal form | `ModelFrontend.fields`, `*_permission` |
| `_pagination.html` | Page navigation | `ModelFrontend.list_per_page` |

## Context Variables
Templates receive context from `views.FrontendModelView.get()` → `site.http_model_response()`:
- `meta.navbar` — navigation registry (from `site.get_navbar_registry()`)
- `meta.sidebar` — sidebar navigation groups (from `site.get_sidebar_registry(request=request)`) — list of `{"group": str, "items": [{"name", "verbose_name", "app_name", "description", ...}]}`
- `meta.css` — CSS path (from `Config.css`)
- `meta.brand` — brand name (from `Config.brand`)
- `meta.logo` — logo path (from `Config.logo`)
- `option.table.*` — display toggles (permissions, search, filter, sort)
- `table.objects` — paginated queryset
- `table.fields` — column headers
- `table.form` — Django ModelForm instance

## Naming Convention
- Page templates: `frontend/{page}.html`
- Partials: `frontend/_{component}.html`
- Account templates: `accounts/{form_type}.html`

## Dependencies
| Package | Purpose |
|---|---|
| `django_bootstrap5` | Bootstrap 5 form rendering and template tags |

## Do / Never
- **DO**: Use `{% load django_bootstrap5 %}` for form rendering in templates
- **DO**: Use `{% load django_fast_frontend %}` for custom filters (`split`, `label`)
- **NEVER**: Hardcode CSS paths — use `meta.css` context variable from `Config`
- **NEVER**: Add new blocks to `base.html` without updating this doc and `context/patterns.md`
